title: JosephBolognese Jr
text: Finally, flowers delivered that actually look like the picture actually, EVEN BETTER! I was a proflowers.com customer for 14 years, settling for what they considered excellent flower arraignments at excellent prices. well I choose not to use them and boy am I glad I didn't! AVAS Flowers sent the most beautiful bouquet of flowers to my fianc√© and they were stunning. I highly recommend them for all your occasions. A+!
